H0.text: Which Oscar-nominated film had You Sexy Thing as its theme song. Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery

H1.text: Which Oscar-nominated film had You Sexy Thing as its theme song. Boogie Nights

H2.text: Which Oscar-nominated film had You Sexy Thing as its theme song. Almost Famous

H3.text: Which Oscar-nominated film had You Sexy Thing as its theme song. Full Monty

A4.text: It was featured in the 1997 film The Full Monty.

A5.text: In the film, the male lead Gaz (played by Robert Carlyle) performs a striptease to the music of 'You Sexy Thing'.
